miRminer 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Retrieve miRNA-disease information from mirTarBase

Source: R/mirtarbase.R
get_mirtar_disease.Rd

Queries mirTarBase for miRNAs associated with the specified disease, then outputs a tibble with the specified information.

get_mirtar_disease(disease)

Arguments

disease

A string corresponding to the disease you want to query.

Value

A tibble containing the miRNAs associated with the specified disease.

Examples


get_mirtar_disease("carcinoma")
#> Processing the request...
#>                           Disease
#> 1                  Adenocarcinoma
#> 2        Adrenocortical carcinoma
#> 3                       Carcinoma
#> 4           Carcinoma, basal cell
#> 5       Carcinoma, ductal, breast
#> 6        Carcinoma, ehrlich tumor
#> 7            Carcinoma, embryonal
#> 8         Carcinoma, endometrioid
#> 9       Carcinoma, hepatocellular
#> 10      Carcinoma, neuroendocrine
#> 11 Carcinoma, non-small-cell lung
#> 12                Carcinoma, oral
#> 13          Carcinoma, renal cell
#> 14          Carcinoma, small cell
#> 15       Carcinoma, squamous cell
#> 16             Cholangiocarcinoma
#> 17                Choriocarcinoma
#> 18     Papilary thyroid carcinoma
#> 19      Small cell lung carcinoma
#>
